com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.model.repository

Class EmployeeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.model.repository.EmployeeRepository

  • @Service
public class EmployeeRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    CRUD repository for Employee Methods in this repository are primary defined to work with active employees, as they are more frequently handled The only method which is able to handle all employees has additional javadoc
